Welcome to my website!
I am Vivek kumar koundinya and you can refer me as vivek,A highly motivated web developer and Python programmer with hands-on experience in creating dynamic and interactive websites and applications. Recognized for strong communication skills, effectively sharing ideas and actively listening to ensure projects align seamlessly with client goals and expectations. A collaborative team player who thrives in group settings, fostering positive relationships and contributing to the overall success of the team.
Passionate about exploring new topics and technologies, constantly expanding skill sets to stay ahead in a fast-evolving industry. Proficient in design, video editing, and social media management, with a creative approach to solving challenges and delivering innovative solutions. Committed to exceeding expectations by combining technical expertise with a keen eye for aesthetics and functionality.
On this website, you will find a selection of my works, cv, and projects. You will also find news and updates on my current research projects, as well as information on upcoming events and I invite you to explore my website and learn more about my life’s work. Please feel free to contact me if you have any questions or would like to discuss potential projects.


Education:


KL university - Hyderabad 
 I did my undergraduate in the field of artificial intelligence and datascience with a 8.4 gpa. I've started it in the year 2020 and completed in 2024. 

George mason university - Fairfax 
Currently, i'm pursuing masters in field of data analytical enigineering. I have started it in the year 2024.

title: Projects
text:

I was doing course in udemy regarding full stack web developemt, then aspart of the course there was a assignment creating a country flag using css elements and it helps to understand how css helps to arrange the layouts. While doing project, i aim do the css layout arragemnt for flags of all world countries. It is a long project, which takes a lot of time. Their is a continuous effort on it. title: Projects
text:
Drum Kit:

Vivek atchutanna | Code
I developed a dynamic and interactive drum kit website using front-end technologies, incorporating JavaScript and DOM manipulation to enhance user engagement. Each drum sound is precisely mapped to a specific keyboard key, enabling users to play sounds by either clicking on the drum elements displayed on the screen or pressing the corresponding keys on their keyboard. Additionally, I utilized HTML and CSS to design and structure the layout of the drum keys, ensuring an intuitive and visually appealing user interface. This project demonstrates my ability to combine coding logic with creative design to deliver an engaging user experience.

title: Projects
text:
DOM project:


Vivek atchutanna | Code
The Document Object Model (DOM) in JavaScript is a programming interface for web documents. I created a website showcasing a DOM animation project where elements respond dynamically to user interactions, such as hovering or clicking. Using JavaScript and CSS, I implemented animations like transitions, color changes, and scaling effects to enhance interactivity and usability.This project demonstrates my skills in DOM manipulation, combining technical expertise with creative design to deliver a responsive and engaging user experience.

title: Projects
text:
Construction website (Koundinyaconstruction.com):

Vivek atchutanna | View
A full working website was developed for Koundinya Constructions, incorporating both frontend and backend functionalities to create a seamless and interactive platform. The website effectively highlights the company’s profile, showcasing its projects, services, and achievements to provide visitors with a comprehensive understanding of the business.The frontend was designed with a user-friendly interface, ensuring ease of navigation and accessibility. A visually appealing layout was crafted to engage users while maintaining a professional look that reflects the brand’s identity.This project demonstrates expertise in full-stack development by combining a well-structured backend with an aesthetically pleasing and functional frontend, ensuring the website serves as a reliable and informative platform for Koundinya Constructions.

title: Education
text:
KL UNIVERSITY.
      
    
    

    
       K L Deemed to be University, formerly Koneru Lakshmaiah College of Engineering and Koneru Lakshmaiah University. In this Institution i did my undergraduation in vast field of enigineering with the specialization of artificial intelligence and data science. In the span of four year's enigineering i learnt skills of machine learning, speech processing python, web development, data base management and also had a little glimpse of django, computer vision, web scraping and many more.
